comments: Just because you are an excellent police officer does not mean that transfers to education. I did not think he had the greatest interest in giving us our time and money worth. When we received our papers back there was just a grade-no comments-like he didn\'t even grade them. School is very expensive for me-I did not appreciate the lack of thought.
Mr. Trinidad is an awesome instructor! He is very helpful and always explains things if you need it, and extremely personable person...fun to learn from.
Great guy has you do things that keep you interacted not the same ole notes and bubble in the answer B.S.
Great teacher. attendance manditory at first. need the book. grades on a curve. reviews before mid term and final. funny guy. looks like Drew Cary with a couple of extra pounds. take him. He is cool.
I\'m taking him this semester and he is a pretty good guy and also helpful. I highly recommend him!

Trindad genuinely cares that you learn what he is teaching. He will adjust the lesson plans accordingly to the class. Does not make attendance mandatory. Very Easy class. Lecture notes and weekly quizzes are easy as well. I recommend this class if you are looking for an easy A. Very nice guy, a lot of stories to tell to make you understand the less
